WelcomeMessage: This is your dedicated portal to submit IT support tickets and service requests.
PrivacyPolicyText: Use this page to detail your site's privacy policy.
ErrorOccurred: An error occurred while processing your request.
SelectRequestTypeDescription: Choose the type of request you would like to submit.
AccessRequestDescription: Request access to systems, applications, or resources that require authorization.
ServiceRequestDescription: Request Social Media Access Permit for company devices or corporate internet network.
SystemChangeRequestDescription: Request changes to systems or infrastructure.
MyTicketsDescription: Track your open requests and follow up with support.
TicketDashboardDescription: Monitor, prioritize, and resolve IT support requests.
Title: Title
UserManagementDescription: Administer roles, account status, and credentials.
DeleteAllTicketsWarning: ⚠️ WARNING: This will delete ALL tickets, attachments, and activity logs. This action cannot be undone! Are you sure?
CreateSupportTicketDescription: Provide detailed information to help our support team respond quickly.
CreateAccessRequestDescription: Submit a request for system or application access.
CreateServiceRequestDescription: Submit a request for Social Media Access Permit.
MyTasksDescription: Tickets assigned to you for review or action.
TeamRequestsDescription: Access requests assigned to you for approval or review.
MyAccessRequestsDescription: Track your access request submissions and their status.
ManagerDashboardDescription: Review pending access requests requiring your approval.
NoTicketsFoundDescription: You don't have any tickets yet. Submit a ticket to get started.
NoTasksAssignedDescription: All tickets assigned to you will appear here.
NoTeamRequestsFoundDescription: Access requests, system changes, and service requests assigned to you will appear here.
NoPendingApprovalsDescription: All access requests have been reviewed.
NoTicketsMatchFilters: No tickets match the current filters.
NoTicketsMatchFiltersDescription: Adjust your filters or broaden your search criteria.
DescribeIssueStepsImpact: Describe the issue, steps taken, and impact
Acknowledged: I acknowledge and agree to the responsibility terms above
UploadSupportingDocuments: Upload supporting documents (JPG, PNG, PDF up to 10 MB each).
FullAccessDescription: Complete access to all system features and functions.
EditAccessDescription: Ability to view and modify content but not system settings.
AdminAccessDescription: Administrative privileges with full system control.
ExplainWhyNeedAccess: Explain why you need this access and how it relates to your job responsibilities...
UploadSupportingDocumentsInfo: Upload supporting documents (PDF, JPG, PNG). Multiple files allowed. Maximum 10 MB per file.
RequestWillBeSubmitted: Request will be submitted for approval after review.
TicketWillBeLogged: Ticket will be logged immediately after submission.
ITExecutionDescription: Final decision for this request. This action will close the ticket.
CreateYourAccount: Create your IT Help Desk account
AccessSupportResources: Access support resources with your @@yub.com.sa email.
OnlyCorporateEmailsAllowed: Only corporate emails ending with @@yub.com.sa are allowed.
UseAnotherService: Use another service to log in.
LockedOut: This account has been locked out, please try again later.
EmailConfirmationRequired: Please confirm your email to log in.
WelcomeAboard: ✅ Welcome aboard, {0}! Your account has been created successfully.
UnableToCreateAccount: ⚠️ Unable to create the account. Please review the form.
TheFieldMustBeAtLeast: The {0} must be at least {2} and at most {1} characters long.
ThePasswordAndConfirmationDoNotMatch: The password and confirmation password do not match.
SignInWithAccount: Sign in with your @@yub.com.sa account to manage support requests.
AccountLockedContactSupport: ⚠️ Your account is locked. Please contact support.
